Notes: Comes in pack of 100, 1.65 per resistor value
If you buy more than 50 you can bring this down to a total cost of 0.16
This is assuming ordering a batch of 100
around 4g of filament, if done through jlc3dp with standard resin, costs 0.3 - This piece includes the clamp connected to the print, but it can also be printed seperately
around 3g of filament, if done through jlc3dp with standard resin, costs 0.3
The diffusion paper can be any semi transparent paper like material, I would reccomend some form of diffusion for this light, as the raw leds look a bit ugly
Economy of scale does come into play here, especially with the attiny and the pcbs
